casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timothy Calvin DENTON 228P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 14, 2019

Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, For Denton, Timothy Calvin

Kathryne E. Hathcock, Assistant Attorney General, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina *34The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of June 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of June 2019."
